ExplorePossibilities.name: Explore Possibilities
ExplorePossibilities.description: Explore the possibilities presented by the creation of a new or improved software system. This includes the analysis of the opportunity to be addressed and the identification of the stakeholders

UnderstandStakeholderNeeds.name: Understand Stakeholder Needs
UnderstandStakeholderNeeds.description: Engage with the stakeholders to understand their needs and ensure that the right results are produced. This includes identifying and working with the stakeholder representatives to progress the opportunity

EnsureStakeholderSatisfaction.name: Ensure Stakeholder Satisfaction
EnsureStakeholderSatisfaction.description: Share the results of the development work with the stakeholders to gain their acceptance of the system produced and verify that the opportunity has been successfully addressed

UsetheSystem.name: Use the System
UsetheSystem.description: Observe the use of the system in a live environment and how it benefits the stakeholders

UnderstandtheRequirements.name: Understand the Requirements
UnderstandtheRequirements.description: Establish a shared understanding of what the system to be produced must do

ShapetheSystem.name: Shape the System
ShapetheSystem.description: Shape the system so that it is easy to develop, change and maintain, and can cope with current and expected future demands. This includes the overall design and architecting of the system to be produced

ImplementtheSystem.name: Implement the System
ImplementtheSystem.description: Build a system by implementing, testing, and integrating one or more system elements. This includes bug fixing and unit testing

TesttheSystem.name: Test the System
TesttheSystem.description: Verify that the system produced meets the stakeholders’ requirements

DeploytheSystem.name: Deploy the System
DeploytheSystem.description: Take the tested system and make it available for use outside the development team

OperatetheSystem.name: Operate the System
OperatetheSystem.description: Support the use of the software system in the live environment

PreparetodotheWork.name: Prepare to do the Work
PreparetodotheWork.description: Set up the team and its working environment. Understand and commit to completing the work

Sprint Planning Meeting.name: Sprint Planning Meeting
Sprint Planning Meeting.description: A meeting to plan for a 2 week sprint lead by project manager

CoordinateActivity.name: Coordinate Activity
CoordinateActivity.description: Co-ordinate and direct the team’s work. This includes all on-going planning and re-planning of the work, and re-shaping of the team

Daily Scrum.name: Daily Scrum
Daily Scrum.description: Lead by Scrum Master every day at 9.00 am

SupporttheTeam.name: Support the Team
SupporttheTeam.description: Help the team members to help themselves, collaborate and improve their way of working

Sprint Retrospective.name: Sprint Retrospective
Sprint Retrospective.description: Ask member if they have problems

TrackProgress.name: Track Progress
TrackProgress.description: Measure and assess the progress made by the team

Sprint Review.name: Sprint Review
Sprint Review.description: Review the 2 week sprint, ask the member if they have problems or not

StoptheWork.name: Stop the Work
StoptheWork.description: Shut-down the software engineering endeavor and handover of the team’s responsibilities
